news.name: Redux Toolkit
news.description: While Reselect is not exclusive to Redux, it is already included by default in the official Redux Toolkit package - no further installation needed.

news.name: Redux
news.description:
Redux is a predictable state container for JavaScript apps.

It helps you write applications that behave consistently, run in different environments (client, server, and native), and are easy to test. On top of that, it provides a great developer experience, such as live code editing combined with a time traveling debugger.

You can use Redux together with Reac

news.name: Footbal news
news.description: react_devtools_backend.js:4061 Warning: findDOMNode is deprecated in StrictMode. findDOMNode was passed an instance of Transition which is inside StrictMode. Instead, add a ref directly to the element you want to reference. Learn more about using refs safely her
